title: PA 시스템
content:
원본 https://scpcb.gamepedia.com/PA_System

[[toc]]

++ PA 시스템
**PA 시스템**은 시설 전체에 자동방송을 하는 알림 시스템이다. 도입부에서 랜덤하게 특정 인물과 장소를 가리키며 방송을 한다.

방송하는 대사는 다음과 같은 조합이 가능하다.

++ 첫 대사

* //"Attention//."
* //"주목//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/c/c0/Attention1.ogg]]

* //"Attention please//."
* //"주목해 주십시오//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/a/ae/Attention2.ogg]]

++ 이유

* //"For maintenance//."
* //"유지 보수를 위해서//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/7/7c/5crew0.ogg]]

* //"For engineering service//."
* //"공학 서비스를 위해서//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/2/24/5crew1.ogg]]

* //"For janitorial service//."
* //"청소 서비스를 위해서//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/a/a0/5crew2.ogg]]

* //"For Clean-up//."
* //"정화 작업을 위해서//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/0/0c/5crew3.ogg]]

* //"For scheduled inspectionp//."
* //"예정된 점검을 위해서//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/1/1d/5crew4.ogg]]

* //"For scheduled safety inspection//."
* //"예정된 안전 점검을 위해서//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/7/78/5crew5.ogg]]

* //"For immediate decontamination clean-up//."
* //"즉각적인 오염 정화를 위해서//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/0/08/5crew6.ogg]]

* //"For scheduled security inspection//."
* //"예정된 보안 점검을 위해서//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/8/89/5scientist0.ogg]]

* //"For briefing//."
* //"브리핑을 위해서//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/0/03/5security0.ogg]]

* //"For immediate service//."
* //"즉각적인 서비스를 위해서//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/b/b8/5security1.ogg]]

* //"For personnel control//."
* //"인원 제어를 위해서//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/0/09/5security2.ogg]]

그 밖에도 대본 같은 몇 가지 발표가 더 있다.

* //"Don`t forget, today is pizza day, so head on down to the cafeteria to grab yourself a hot slice!."//
* //"잊지 마십시오. 오늘은 피자의 날입니다. 그러니 구내식당으로 가 자신에게 뜨거운 피자 한 조각을 쥐여주십시오!"//
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/b/b8/Announcement1.ogg]]

* //"Remember, security is the first step towards a safe work environment! Stay secure, stay vigilant//."
* //"기억하세요, 보안은 안전한 작업 환경을 향한 첫 걸음입니다. 보안을 유지하십시오! 경계를 유지하십시오//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/5/5f/Announcement2.ogg]]

* //"A reminder, to all personnel: Motivational seminars are held at the faculty auditorium from hours 17 to 18 on Thursdays! Come on down and get motivated!//"
* //"모든 직원, 기억하십시오. 목요일엔 17시에서 18시까지 교직원 강당에서 동기 부여 세미나가 열립니다! 내려와서 동기부여를 받으십시오!//"
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/9/9f/Announcement3.ogg]]

* //"Remember to report all suspicious activity to your supervisors. Not even you are exempt from scrutiny. Stay paranoid, stay vigilant//."
* //"모든 의심스러운 일을 즉시 감독관에게 보고하십시오. 당신조차도 정밀조사를 면제받을 수 없습니다. 편집적으로 있으십시오. 경계를 유지하십시오.//"
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/8/8c/Announcement4.ogg]]

* //""Feeling out of shape? Drop by the faculty gymnasium and feel free to participate in a game of community badminton on sundays!//"
* //"컨디션이 안 좋으십니까? 시설 체육관에 들러 일요일마다 배드민턴 경기에 자유롭게 참가하십시오!//"
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/5/5f/Announcement5.ogg]]

* //"Feel tired and overworked? Freshly brewed coffee is served at the cafeteria at all hours.//"
* //"피곤하고 과로했다고 느끼십니까? 구내식당에서 갓 끓인 커피가 항상 제공됩니다.//"
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/2/27/Announcement6.ogg]]

* //"Come down and join our annual movie night this saturday! This years film: `Area 51: Panic and Terror 2 miles under!//"
* //"이번 주 토요일 연례 영화제에 함께하십시오! 올해의 영화는 `51구역: 2마일 아래의 공황 그리고 공포입니다!//"
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/e/ed/Announcement7.ogg]]

* //"Attention, [[[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/cb:scientists#toc3|Security Chief Franklin]]]. Please report to [http://ko.scp-wiki.net/cb:light-containment-zone#toc1|containment chamber 1-7-3] immediately//."
* //"주목, [[[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/cb:scientists#toc3|보안 담당자 프랭클린]]]씨. 즉시 [[[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/cb:light-containment-zone#toc1|1-7-3 격리실]]]에 대해 신속히 보고해주십시오//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/6/60/Scripted1.ogg]]

* //"[[[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/cb:scientists#toc11|Doctor L]]], please report to Heavy Containment Checkpoint C//."
* //"[[[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/cb:scientists#toc11|L. 박사님]]], 고위험군 격리 구역 C 검문소에 대해 보고해주십시오//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/6/69/Scripted2.ogg]]

* //"Attention, [[[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/cb:scientists#toc12|Doctor Maynard]]], Report to administrations office immediately//."
* //"주목, [[[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/cb:scientists#toc12|메이너드 박사님]]], 행정실에 보고해 주십시오//."
[[include component:audio-player
|URL=https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/b/b7/Scripted3.ogg]]

* //"Maintenance Crew Alpha, report to Light Containment elevator 6A for safety inspection//."
* //"알파 정비팀, 안전검사를 위해 저위험군 격리 구역 6A 엘리베이터에 대해 보고하십시오//."
[[include component:audio-player
